mapper.select: SELECT if(otb.exam_code is null, stb.exam_code, otb.exam_code) as exam_code, if(otb.name is null, stb.name, otb.name) as name, if(otb.cls_name is null, stb.cls_name, otb.cls_name) as cls_name, if(otb.score is null, stb.score, otb.score) as score, otb.objans, stb.subans FROM (SELECT paper.exam_code, ee.name, class.cls_name, subscore.score, GROUP_CONCAT(oans.quesno, '-', oans.answer ORDER BY oans.quesno) AS objans FROM ustudy.paper LEFT JOIN obj_answer AS oans ON oans.paperid = paper.id LEFT JOIN examgradesub AS egs ON paper.exam_grade_sub_id = egs.id LEFT JOIN examinee AS ee ON (ee.exam_code = paper.exam_code and egs.examid = ee.examid) left join class on class.id = ee.class_id left join subscore on (subscore.exam_grade_sub_id = paper.exam_grade_sub_id and subscore.stuid = ee.id) LEFT JOIN question ON (question.exam_grade_sub_id = paper.exam_grade_sub_id AND oans.quesno >= question.startno AND question.endno >= oans.quesno) WHERE paper.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} AND question.type IN ('单选题' , '多选题', '判断题') GROUP BY paper.exam_code, ee.name, class.id, subscore.score ORDER BY class.id, paper.exam_code) otb RIGHT JOIN (SELECT exam_code, name, cls_name, fscore as score, GROUP_CONCAT(quesno, '-', score ORDER BY quesno) AS subans FROM ((SELECT ee.exam_code, ee.name, class.cls_name, question.quesno, subscore.score as fscore, answer.score FROM ustudy.answer LEFT JOIN paper ON paper.id = paperid LEFT JOIN question ON answer.quesid = question.id LEFT JOIN examgradesub AS egs ON paper.exam_grade_sub_id = egs.id LEFT JOIN examinee AS ee ON (ee.exam_code = paper.exam_code and egs.examid = ee.examid) left join class on class.id = ee.class_id left join subscore on (subscore.exam_grade_sub_id = paper.exam_grade_sub_id and subscore.stuid = ee.id) WHERE question.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} AND question.type NOT IN ('单选题' , '多选题', '判断题') AND question.quesno > 0 ORDER BY ee.exam_code , question.startno) UNION (SELECT ee.exam_code, ee.name, class.cls_name, anst.quesno, subscore.score as fscore, anst.score FROM ustudy.answer LEFT JOIN paper ON paper.id = paperid LEFT JOIN question ON answer.quesid = question.id LEFT JOIN answer_step AS anst ON anst.answer_id = answer.id LEFT JOIN examgradesub AS egs ON paper.exam_grade_sub_id = egs.id LEFT JOIN examinee AS ee ON (ee.exam_code = paper.exam_code and egs.examid = ee.examid) left join class on class.id = ee.class_id left join subscore on (subscore.exam_grade_sub_id = paper.exam_grade_sub_id and subscore.stuid = ee.id) WHERE question.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} AND question.type NOT IN ('单选题' , '多选题', '判断题') AND question.quesno = 0 ORDER BY ee.exam_code, question.startno , anst.quesno) ORDER BY exam_code , quesno) tb1 GROUP BY exam_code , name, cls_name, fscore) stb ON otb.exam_code = stb.exam_code order by cast(substring_index( substring_index(if(otb.cls_name is null, stb.cls_name, otb.cls_name), '）', 1), '（', -1) as signed), exam_code

select otbl.rans, stbl.qscore, (if(otbl.fscore is null, 0, otbl.fscore) + if(stbl.fscore is null, 0, stbl.fscore)) as score from (SELECT group_concat(refanswer.quesno, '-', answer order by refanswer.quesno) as rans, sum(score) as fscore FROM ustudy.refanswer left join question on (question.exam_grade_sub_id = refanswer.exam_grade_sub_id and refanswer.quesid = question.id) where refanswer.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} order by quesid) otbl join (select group_concat(quesno, '-', score order by quesno) as qscore, sum(score) as fscore from ( SELECT question.quesno, question.score FROM ustudy.question where exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} and question.quesno > 0 and question.type not in ('单选题','多选题','判断题') union (select question_step.quesno, question_step.score from question_step left join question on question_step.quesid = question.id where question.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} and question.quesno = 0 and question.type not in ('单选题','多选题','判断题'))) tb1) stbl

SELECT ee.exam_code, ee.name, class.cls_name, subscore.score, subscore.rank, group_concat(subject.name, '-', scs.score, '-', scs.rank) as child FROM examinee AS ee LEFT JOIN class ON class.id = ee.class_id LEFT JOIN examgradesub AS egs ON (egs.examid = ee.examid AND egs.grade_id = ee.gradeid) LEFT JOIN subscore ON (subscore.stuid = ee.id AND egs.id = subscore.exam_grade_sub_id) left join subchildscore as scs on scs.parent_id = subscore.id left join subject on subject.id = scs.sub_id WHERE egs.id = #{egsid} group by ee.id ORDER BY ee.exam_code
